name: I AM NEVER ENOUGH
description:
When your identity is built around being good at something, it can be quite disheartening to find out you're falling short of your own standards. During these moments, one can feel like they are never enough.

Gamepad recommended for optimal gameplay experience
Keyboard also supported

Controls (gamepad):
Left stick to move
South button (A) to jump
Hold both triggers to breathe in. Release to breathe out. (Only in certain areas)

Controls (keyboard):
A and D to move
Space to jump
Hold W to breathe in. Release to breathe out. (Only in certain areas)

Escape closes the game.
